text:
I′ve been walking down this road
Long enough long enough
I've been searching all of my days
To find something and it′s still so far
Oooo oooo oooo oooo
Like a song about the rainbow
Coming after its stop raining
Like not sleeping at night
Cause I'm waiting for the dawn
I feel close right now with you
Oooo oooo oooo oooo
Like a song about the rainbow
Coming after its stop raining
Like not sleeping at night
Cause I'm waiting for the dawn
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
I feel close right now with you
trans:
나는 이 길을 걸어왔어
오래도록 오래도록
매일같이 노력을 했어
무언가를 찾으려고 근데 여전히 너무 멀리 있어
우우우우 우우우우 우우우우 우우우우
무지개에 대한 노래처럼
비가 그친 후 온다는 무지개
밤잠을 놓치는 것처럼
새벽을 기다리느라
지금 너와 가까움을 느껴
